Config.Segment_SQL: select distinct account_seg1_code, account_seg1_name from W_GL_ACCOUNT_D;
Config.row_wid_SQL: SELECT distinct mcal_period_wid, MCAL_period_NAME FROM W_MCAL_PERIOD_D WHERE MCAL_CAL_NAME = 'ABC Accounting'
